title: Slums shall mean those censused, or declared and notified, in the past or hereafter under the Slum Act
clause_text: Slums shall mean those censused, or declared and notified, in the past or hereafter under the Slum Act. Slum shall also mean area/pavement stretches hereafter notified or deemed to be and treated as Slum Rehabilitation Areas.
section: Definition of Slum, Pavement, and Structure of hut:
